bill_title: to allow counties and municipalities to regulate use, distribution, marketing, and promotion of instant, on-line, or video lottery.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow counties and municipalities to regulate use, distribution, marketing, and promotion of instant, on-line, or video lottery. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 42-7A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any municipality for the area within its boundaries and any county for the area outside of any municipal boundaries within the county may provide, by ordinance, for regulations relating to the use, distribution, marketing, and promotion of instant, on-line, or video lottery that are more restrictive than regulations provided for by the Legislature. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
